meanings.definition: A brand name for a line of glass bakeware and kitchen products.
meanings.sent1: The store had a sale on pyrex products.
meanings.sent2: I received a set of pyrex bowls as a gift.
meanings.sent3: The pyrex bakeware threw a party for all the other kitchen tools.
meanings.sent4: Her kitchen was filled with the sparkle of pyrex products.
meanings.sent5: The pyrex measuring cup was her favorite tool for baking cookies.
